data.title: AMS :: Mathematics of Computation
data.text:
Counting points on elliptic curves over $\mathbf {F}_{2^m}$

HTML articles powered by AMS MathViewer

by Alfred J. Menezes, Scott A. Vanstone and Robert J. Zuccherato PDF

Math. Comp. 60 (1993), 407-420 Request permission

Abstract:

In this paper we present an implementation of Schoofâs algorithm for computing the number of ${F_{{2^m}}}$-points of an elliptic curve that is defined over the finite field ${F_{{2^m}}}$. We have implemented some heuristic improvements, and give running times for various problem instances.
